definitions.definition: At or forming a right angle ( to something).
examples: In most houses, the walls are perpendicular to the floor.

definitions.definition: Exactly upright ; extending in a straight line toward the centre of the earth, etc.
Independent of or irrelevant to each other; orthogonal .

main_definition: ( geometry ) At or forming a right angle ( to something).
secondary_definitions: Exactly upright ; extending in a straight line toward the centre of the earth, etc.
Independent of or irrelevant to each other; orthogonal .
